name: Samurai Unicorn
storyline:
In the sprawling megacity of Sydney3, a young detective becomes the unwilling host of a parasitic gauntlet and gains the power to fight back against the growing threat spreading through the lower levels.

Everyone has a plan for Sydney3… As Klo, you must adapt to your new bond with Samurai Unicorn, venture into VRmin-infested locations to uncover Goliath’s secrets, and hunt down the Dream Eaters that are invading the city.

With a diverse range of characters all fighting for the future of Sydney3, the story of Samurai Unicorn will be an engaging saga of mystery and rising action as Klo struggles against the many enemies standing in her way.
summary: An action horror game with retro-graphics, set in the sprawling megacity of Sydney3.
